column4: hey, i just tried creating a bootable usb from the download image, and it wont boot from my machine, anyone know why? i used dd on my mac to copy the image to my usb key. ive booted from the same usb key for other linux distros...
dd doesnt work for ubuntu images.  use netbootin
the instructions say to use dd, and unetbootin doesnt list my usb key
new one to me.  I've never had any luck dding ubuntu images
